b'@Stottwood1 Whereas $NMCI still trades at 1x forward earnings and $DAC at 1.5x forward earnings, $CMRE is at maybe 5x forward and ATCO like 7x.  Yes, $CMRE and $ATCO deserve somewhat higher valuations, but not this gap.  $CMRE and $ATCO will go up but $NMCI and $DAC will go up A LOT more.'

b'@Stottwood1 If rates continue, every containership company is a buy at this point and most have meaningful exposure in 2021.  The big difference between $NMCI, $DAC and the rest is relative valuation.  $CMRE and $ATCO already had stong charter cover at high rates with valuations to match.'

b'Sure, but how? There is almost no idle capacity and very low orderbook. There are ships coming up for recharter, but they will have to pay up :)

The laggards have been $CMRE and $CPLP which in my opinion is likely due to some lingering sentiment. CMRE for Q3 earnings miss and $CPLP for dividend cuts'
